articles.author: Arianna Johnson
articles.title: Vaping Health Risks: Study Suggests Nearly 20% Increased Threat Of Heart Disease From E-Cigarette Use - Forbes
articles.description: Over six million Americans experienced heart failure in 2020, and that number is estimated to increase to 8.5 million by 2030.
articles.content: Vapes containing nicotine may increase the risk of heart failure, according to a new study, adding on to previous research that found vaping may increase the risk of heart disease, worsen blood press… [+4036 chars]
